name: AsiaBill Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: AsiaBill

sections.description: Accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Diners Club, Discover, Alipay, Wechat Pay, Cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin, Ether, USDT, DOGE, Sofort, iDeal, Giropay, P24, Paysafecard, Boleto, Klarna and more directly on your store with the AsiaBill payment gateway for WooCommerce, including Apple Pay and Google Pay for mobile and desktop.
sections.faq:

https://en.asiabill.com/

Where can I get support or talk to your customer service team?

https://en.asiabill.com/contact

short_description: Take credit/debit card and other payment methods on your store using AsiaBill.
description: Accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Diners Club, Discover, Alipay, Wechat Pay, Cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin, Ether, USDT, DOGE, Sofort, iDeal, Giropay, P24, Paysafecard, Boleto, Klarna and more directly on your store with the AsiaBill payment gateway for WooCommerce, including Apple Pay and Google Pay for mobile and desktop.

screenshots.caption: AsiaBill provides various payment methods from Credit Card Payment to Local Payment Methods.
The Payment Setting page is used to set up the main AsiaBill Gateway. For any queries please contact us at https://en.asiabill.com/contact.
Customers can choose to pay with a saved payment method or a new card and save their card details for future purchases.
You can keep track of the transaction state changes as well as all the other payment information for each order in this page.
